turns.llm_utterance:
Hey there! Did you have your *prenatal check-up* scheduled for this week? 🏥

Please reply with one of the following:
- 'Yes, I went'
- 'No, I'm not going'
- 'I'm going soon'
Did a health worker attend to you during your prenatal check-up?

That's great to hear 🌟 Would you be able to spare 2 minutes to share with us how your prenatal check-up went?

Please reply with one of the following:
- 'Yes'
- 'Remind me tomorrow'
During your last check-up, did a health worker measure your blood pressure?

How would you rate your overall experience at the check-up?

a. Very good
b. Good
c. OK
d. Bad
e. Very bad

Thank you for sharing. There are just 2 more questions to go. Your responses will help us improve services for pregnant women in South Africa. Would you like to continue?

Please reply with Continue to continue.

Please choose from the following options to share what made you feel the most uncomfortable or caused you the biggest problem during your check-up:

a. No maternity record 📝
b. Shamed/embarrassed 😳
c. No privacy 🤐
d. Not enough info ℹ️
e. Staff disrespectful 🤬
f. Asked to pay 💰
g. Waited a long time ⌛
h. Something else 😞

Sometimes it can be tough to get to these check-ups. If you face challenges, what is your *main difficulty*?

a. No challenges 👌
b. Transport 🚌
c. No support 🤝
d. Clinic opening hours 🏥
e. Something else 😞
turns.user_utterance: It's hard to get there during clinic opening hours 🏥

turns.llm_utterance: Looking ahead, do you plan to attend your next prenatal check-up to ensure the best health for you and your baby?
